## useAutoFocus variable

Hook to automatically request focus for an DOM element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useAutoFocus: (isFocused?: boolean, options?: FocusOptions) => Ref<{
    focus: (options?: FocusOptions) => void;
}>
```
